amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 5 of the bill which would eliminate the current exemption from the Unfunded Mandate Reform Act for certain independent agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-362 to strike section 5 of the bill, which would eliminate the current exemption from the Unfunded Mandate Reform Act for certain independent agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 224 (Roll no. 86).
